text: Deem Bristow (April 11, 1947 - January 15, 2005) was an American actor. He has done the voice of many characters in animated series and video games. He was best known for his role as Dr. Eggman in the Sonic the Hedgehog video game series from 1998 to 2004. ==Death== Bristow died on January 15, 2005 from a heart attack in San Diego, California at the age of 57. ==Movies and television== ===Movies=== *Freeway - TV interviewer *Glitch! - Newscaster *I Am Joe's Ear - Joe *Problem Child - Additional voices *Terminal Exposure - Anchorman ===Television=== *Paranoia Agent - Masami Hirukawa *Rumic Theater: Mermaid Forest - Flower Shop Owner, Manager Hosoda *R.O.D the TV - Old Man, Chief Researcher *Quantum Leap - King *Spirit of Wonder: China-san no y√ªutsu - Breckenridge *Texhnolyze - The Sage Of Gabe ===Video games=== *Angel Devoid: Face of the Enemy - Dr. Silvanus, Rev. Gold *Blue Stinger - Dogs Bower *Call of Cthulhu: Dark Corners of the Earth - Jack's Father, Cult Member, Cutter Urania Navigation Officer *D2 - Additional voices *Dark Seed - Additional voices *Diablo II - Meshif *Die Hard Trilogy 2: Viva Las Vegas - Kenny Sinclair *Dungeon Lords - Galdryn, Lord Graemare, Urcula *High Seize - Black Barlow, Crimson Bob, Ezekiel Wiggins *Sonic Advance 3 - Dr. Eggman *Sonic Adventure - Dr. Eggman *Sonic Adventure 2 - Dr. Eggman *Sonic Battle - Dr. Eggman *Sonic Heroes - Dr. Eggman *Sonic Riders - Dr. Eggman (archive footage) *Sonic Shuffle - Dr. Eggman == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2005 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Ohio
title: Deem Bristow
